title: Jordan Peterson Explains John Calvin to Sam Harris using Science (fixed)
description:
Beneath our values are axioms that act like personalities and are expressed in values and actions. For ancients these would be our self, spirits, daemons, the gods or "God". They are both individual and communal. JBP tries to explain the science behind this to Sam. Is this Calvin's sensus divinitatus? 

There was a problem with the first one I posted. Fixing it too longer than making it. There will be issues with video sync in some of the clips but it won't kill you. After I make a video I'm almost always dissatisfied with it which usually prompts me to make a new one but I'm out of video making time for this week (except for Rough Draft for Sunday tomorrow AM) so it will have to do. Feel free to rip it apart in the comment section. 

Dublin talk https://youtu.be/ZZI-FwSQRn8 
Daemon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daemon_(classical_mythology) 
John Calvin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sensus_divinitatis  
NT Wright Gifford Lectures https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zdUM0ZB5zT0&list=PLv797D4CCFPAyZfVlS02nzhFD-l2GgHf4

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
